scripts.docs:dev: FORCE_COLOR=3 DEBUG_COLORS=true DEBUG_SHOW_HIDDEN=true vuepress dev docs --cache docs/.cache --temp docs/.temp --no-clear-screen --no-cache --debug
scripts.docs:dev2: FORCE_COLOR=3 NODE_ENV=development VUEPRESS_ENV=developer vuepress dev docs --cache docs/.cache --temp docs/.temp --no-clear-screen --no-cache --debug
scripts.docs:dev3: VUE_CLI_MODERN_MODE=true VUE_CLI_MODERN_BUILD=true VUE_APP_NODE_ENV=development NODE_DEBUG=webpack FORCE_COLOR=3 NODE_ENV=development VUEPRESS_ENV=developer vuepress dev docs --cache docs/.cache --temp docs/.temp --no-clear-screen --debug
scripts.docs:build: DEBUG=config:* FORCE_COLOR=3 DEBUG_COLORS=true DEBUG_SHOW_HIDDEN=true vuepress build docs --no-cache --debug
scripts.lint-md: EXIT_STATUS=0; yarn lint-md:style || EXIT_STATUS=$?; yarn lint-md:wording || EXIT_STATUS=$?; exit $EXIT_STATUS
